claim_card.claim: Φ (Phi) is introduced as a dimensionless coherence metric built from entropy production rate, dissipative flux, and effective temperature.
claim_card.test_hook: Compute Φ from measurable proxies (or simulation outputs) and test whether stable regimes exhibit persistent Φ structure vs unstable regimes.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: where Ṡ is the entropy production rate, Q̇ the net dissipative flux, and T the local effective temperature.
